lstDialogOne: I'm pleased to announce the Morning Stars charitable work has been a success!
Now more poor unemployed souls have been given great opportunities to work for someone much richer than them! |p1
Today I am here to ask for your support in helping to clear the streets of rabid animals
There are hundreds, if not thousands of animals wondering the streets!
With your help, these animals suffering will end and people are free to reclaim the kingdom!
All I ask.. is for 2 coins |c
lstDialogTwo: Today I am here to ask for your support in helping to clear the streets of rabid animals
There are hundreds, if not thousands of animals wondering the streets!
With your help, these animals suffering will end and people are free to reclaim the kingdom!

lstOutcomeYesText: Hehehe, I will begin to round up the creatures immediatly
lstOutcomeNoText: Thats a shame, I'll be back soon with no doubt another noble cause
lstCantAffordText: Oh dear, it looks like you can't afford to help m-I mean..the needy
